law.catch_line: Qualifications of director of Division of Mine Safety.

text.section: The director of the Division of Mine Safety shall be a citizen of Kentucky and shall be thoroughly familiar with all methods of safety pertaining to the operation of mines.
The director shall be capable of efficiently reporting on any proposed development in mining operations or the possibility of operating any coal or clay seam.
The director shall hold a mine inspector's or mine safety specialist's certificate.
